titleStmt.title: A letter concerning the souldiers and their orders about the commissioners sent from the Parliament, to treat with the Kings Majesty. And the souldiers resolutions, and intentions therin also a letter concerning the levying of 91 regiaments of horse and foot in Scotland. With a list of the Lords, and other collonels of the said regiaments. And the declaration of the Committee of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Smithurst, neer Pye-corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
